cart.name: Magic Amazon
cart.info: The Magic Amazon is a Tiki cocktail made of fruit juices, liqueurs, and various rums. It first appeared in late 1934, invented by Donn Beach at his Hollywood Don the Beachcomber restaurant.

cart.name: Orange Juice
cart.info: Orange juice is a liquid extract of the orange tree fruit, produced by squeezing or reaming oranges. It comes in several different varieties, including blood orange, navel oranges, valencia orange, clementine, and tangerine.

cart.name: Blue Lagoon
cart.info: The Blue Lagoon is a French cocktail featuring blue Curaçao mixed with vodka and lemonade. It is typically garnished with an orange slice or a lemon slice. A Blue Lagoon is typically served in a hurricane glass

cart.name: Blue Lagoon

products.name: Orange Juice
products.info: Orange juice is a liquid extract of the orange tree fruit, produced by squeezing or reaming oranges. It comes in several different varieties, including blood orange, navel oranges, valencia orange, clementine, and tangerine.

products.name: Coca-Cola
products.info: Coca-Cola, or Coke, is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by The Coca-Cola Company. Originally marketed as a temperance drink and intended as a patent medicine, it retains a bitter taste and burnt sugar odor.

products.name: Passion Tropic
products.info: Light and breezy this passion fruit mojito is an easy cocktail to make at home. With mint, passion fruit juice and rum this passion fruit mojito is a vacation in a glass.

products.name: Blue Lagoon

products.name: Magic Amazon
products.info: The Magic Amazon is a Tiki cocktail made of fruit juices, liqueurs, and various rums. It first appeared in late 1934, invented by Donn Beach at his Hollywood Don the Beachcomber restaurant.

products.name: Royal Blue
products.info: The Royal Blue cocktail is a dark blue drink with vodka and lemonade. The traditional garnish of an orange slice or a thin wedge of lime makes this cocktail more refreshing. But if you enjoy experimenting with your drinks, try adding some cordial for just the right amount of tang!

products.name: Pina Colado
products.info: The piña colada is a cocktail made with rum, cream of coconut, and pineapple juice, usually served either blended or shaken with ice. It may be garnished with either a pineapple wedge, maraschino cherry, or both. The drink originated in Puerto Rico

products.name: Zombie
products.info: The Zombie is a Tiki cocktail made of fruit juices, liqueurs, and various rums. It first appeared in late 1934, invented by Donn Beach at his Hollywood Don the Beachcomber restaurant.
